snippet: The State House approved a measure that would outlaw abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, based on the disputed premise that a fetus can feel pain at that point.
abstract: North Dakota State House approves measure that would outlaw abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, based on disputed premise that a fetus can feel pain at that point.
lead_paragraph: The State House approved a measure that would outlaw abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, based on the disputed premise that a fetus can feel pain at that point.

headline.main: North Dakota: House Passes More Abortion Limits
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: House Passes More Abortion Limits
